definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她们都穿着最昂贵的衣服，留着长长的美丽的鬈发。
穿着有吸引力但不挑逗。

sentences.english: He wore a dirty white t-shirt and high-water jeans.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着意见很脏的白色衬衫和一件牛仔马裤。

sentences.english: I had an alb on and a long robe with long sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 我穿着白袍，一件带长袖的长袍。

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根据当天的时刻和我要去的地点来决定。

sentences.english: Her old-fashioned clothes really date her.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着老土，显得很老气。

sentences.english: A girl in Yao minority dress warmly greeting customers.
sentences.chinese: 穿着民族服装的瑶家姑娘，热情地招呼来往市民。

sentences.english: Today madam Gao is wearing a red skirt.
sentences.chinese: 当今高老师穿着一件红裙子。

sentences.english: Wear clothes that flatter and fit.
sentences.chinese: 穿着好看和合身的衣服。

sentences.english: They were in proper tennis whites .
sentences.chinese: 他们都穿着可体的白色网球服。

sentences.english: ONE highly-skilled legal professional and one man in a very expensive suit.
sentences.chinese: 一个高级法律顾问和一个穿着非常昂贵的西装的男人。

sentences.english: He is wearing an olive green coat.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着件橄榄绿的外套。

sentences.english: The best way to wear animal print is to keep it subtle and simple.
sentences.chinese: 最好的穿着豹纹的方法是让它看起来精致而简洁。

sentences.english: The horse is wearing my sweater.
She was also cut out in paper, but she had a dress of the clearest gauze.
sentences.chinese: 女郎也是用卡纸剪的，但是她却穿着透明的纱裙。

sentences.english: He cumbered himself with an overcoat on a warm day.
sentences.chinese: 大热天穿着件大衣简直使他活受罪。

definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread
whole body/from head to toe/single person/a suit of clothes
